items.title: Real-time Team Collaboration
items.description: Enable multiple team members to view, create, update, and comment on tasks in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Multiple users can edit task details simultaneously without data loss
Changes made by one user are visible to others within 2 seconds
Users can comment on tasks and see comments instantly
System maintains an activity log of changes with timestamps and user IDs
non_functional: System should support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation
Data synchronization latency must be under 2 seconds
Ensure secure data transmission using HTTPS

notes: Assumed the requirement focuses on real-time collaboration features within a task management context. Core task management features are considered prerequisites.
